name: In Memory of the Heroes of Verdun
obverse: A woman representing the soldiers of France standing with Marianne in front of Verdun. The Germans are represented as an eagle holding a sword.
reverse: 3 medallions with the busts of generals Pétain, Nivelle and Curières de Castelnau above an inscription in 5 lines in a laurel wreath. Two military medals hang at the bottom of the wreath.
description: This medal was made to commemorate the Heroes of Verdun in WWI.
